valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 16 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 17 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of Rockall 983 expected Fastnet 997 by 1800 Friday. Low south England 994 expected Norwegian Basin 1003 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southerly 4 or 5, becoming variable 2 for a time. In east, southerly or southeasterly becoming cyclonic, 4 to 6, then becoming southerly 3 to 5 later.
Sea state
In west, rough becoming mainly moderate. in east, moderate occasionally rough.
Weather
In west, showers. In east, occasional rain.
Visibility
In west, good. In east, good, occasionally poor.
